## Dirichlet distribution review

$$
\text{Dirichlet}(\rho \mid \alpha_1, \ldots , \alpha_K) = \frac{\Gamma(\sum_{k=1}^K \alpha_k)}{\prod_{k=1}^K \Gamma(\alpha_k)} \prod_{k=1}^K \rho_k^{\alpha_k - 1} \qquad a_k>0
$$
